battle_traits.name: Noble Deeds
battle_traits.description: Each member of a ghoulish court constantly seeks to prove their valour by performing worthy exploits on the battlefield.
battle_traits.effect: Each friendly Flesh-eater Courts Hero starts the battle with 0 noble deeds points and can have a maximum of 6 noble deeds points at once. Each time a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Hero uses a Fight ability, after that ability has been resolved, give that Hero a number of noble deeds points equal to the number of damage points inflicted by that ability. Do not count attacks made with Companion weapons. Each time a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Priest Hero uses a Prayer ability and the prayer is answered, after that ability has been resolved, give that Hero 1 noble deeds point. Each time a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Wizard Hero uses a Spell ability and the spell is successfully cast, after that ability has been resolved, give that Hero 1 noble deeds point.

battle_traits.name: Feeding Frenzy
battle_traits.description: As the court closes in upon its enemies, the nobility signal for the feasting to begin.
battle_traits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons, including Companion weapons, used by friendly Flesh-eater Courts units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly Heroes that have 6 noble deeds points.

battle_traits.name: Muster Guard
battle_traits.description: Courtiers are perceived as ranking officers who possess the charisma to rally wavering troops.
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Courtier Hero that has 1 or more noble deeds points to use this ability, then pick a friendly unit wholly within 12" of it to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Spend any of that Hero's noble deeds points. If the target is a Serfs unit, for each noble deeds point spent, return 1 slain model to it. If the target is a Knights unit, for every 2 noble deeds points spent, return 1 slain model to it.

battle_traits.name: Summon Loyal Subjects
battle_traits.description: To the mordants, an ear-splitting howl from the throat of an abhorrant is a clarion call to defend the kingdom.
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Abhorrant Hero that has 6 noble deeds points to use this ability, then pick a friendly Serfs or Knights unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Spend all of that Hero's noble deeds points. Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battle_traits.name: Royal Blood
battle_traits.description: The vampiric blood that courses through an abhorrant's veins can heal even the most terrible wounds.
battle_traits.declare: Pick any number of friendly Abhorrants to be the targets.

Cannibal Court.name: A Hunger For Glory
Cannibal Court.description: Seeking to rise up the depraved hierarchy of their kind, champions of the courts will attempt to outdo one another with acts of derring-do, such as launching bold and bloody raids deep into enemy territory.
Cannibal Court.effect: Give 1 noble deeds point to each friendly Flesh-eater Courts Hero wholly outside friendly territory.

Ghoul Patrol.name: Gore-Splattered Hunters
Ghoul Patrol.description: The mordants of the Ghoul Patrols scuttle through their perceived kingdoms in deranged warbands, ready to assail the enemy in coordinated strikes.
Ghoul Patrol.effect: When players are alternating picking units to use a Fight ability, when it is your turn to pick a unit, you can pick 2 Crypt Ghouls units instead of 1. Neither unit can have Strike-last. Resolve the second Fight ability immediately after the first.

Lords Of The Manor.name: Raise The Banners
Lords Of The Manor.description: In the dominating presence of their royal masters, courtiers of every rank call forth their minions in ever greater numbers.
Lords Of The Manor.effect: Each time a friendly unit uses an ability that returns any slain models to a friendly Serfs or Knights unit, add 1 to the number of slain models returned to that unit.

Royal Menagerie.name: Meat For The Beast
Royal Menagerie.description: In battle, Flesh-eater monarchs often toss their pet monstrosities choice cuts of flesh, granting them a burst of strength and ferocity.
Royal Menagerie.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Monster to be the target.
Royal Menagerie.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

heroic_traits.name: Cruel Taskmaster
heroic_traits.description: The warriors under this courtier's command instantly obey their summons.
heroic_traits.effect: Each time a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the 'Rally' command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

heroic_traits.name: Savage Beyond Reason
heroic_traits.description: The fury of battle drives this general into an intense rage.
heroic_traits.effect: While this unit has fewer than 6 noble deeds points, its melee weapons have Crit (2 Hits). While it has 6 noble deeds points, its melee weapons have Crit (Mortal).

heroic_traits.name: Stronger In Madness
heroic_traits.description: The Boon of Ushoran has rendered this warrior's physical form near-indestructible.
heroic_traits.effect: Add 2 to this unit's Health characteristic. In addition, while this unit has 6 noble deeds points, it has Ward (5+).

artefacts_of_power.name: Charnel Vestments
artefacts_of_power.description: Strips of flayed skin and crudely stitched sinew form a gruesome parody of priestly robes.
artefacts_of_power.effect: If this unit is not a Priest, it has Priest (1). If this unit is already a Priest, add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit. If this unit is a Wizard, it cannot use Spell abilities and Prayer abilities in the same phase.

artefacts_of_power.name: The Grim Garland
artefacts_of_power.description: Formed from the skulls of kings and emperors, this morbid wreath evokes fear in all who see it.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

artefacts_of_power.name: Heart Of The Gargant
artefacts_of_power.description: This slab of muscle still beats with the strength of the gargant from which it was torn, and each bite of it grants colossal might.
artefacts_of_power.effect: If this unit is in combat, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons for the rest of the turn. This ability also affects Companion weapons.

Lore Of Madness.name: Deranged Transfor Mation
Lore Of Madness.description: The spellcaster causes the limbs of a nearby pack to bulge and lengthen, allowing the creatures to charge forwards at a furious pace and imbuing them with greater strength.
Lore Of Madness.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Flesh-eater Courts Infantry or Cavalry unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Madness.effect: Until the start of your next turn: * Add 2" to the target's Move characteristic. * Add 1 to wound rolls for the target's combat attacks.

Lore Of Madness.name: Miasma Of Madness
Lore Of Madness.description: The wizard calls forth a sanity-warping mist to engulf the foe.
Lore Of Madness.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Madness.effect: Roll 7 dice and apply the corresponding effect: Ravaged Mind: If 2 or more dice have the same value, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. Gory Visions: If 3 or more dice have the same value, in addition to the effect of 'Ravaged Mind', subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks until the start of your next turn. Drooling Stupor: If 4 or more dice have the same value, in addition to the effects of 'Ravaged Mind' and 'Gory Visions', subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target's attacks until the start of your next turn.

Lore Of Madness.name: Charnel Feast
Lore Of Madness.description: The caster draws out the life essence of nearby foes and uses it to heal the injured warriors of the court.
Lore Of Madness.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Madness.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, you can pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Infantry unit within 6" of the target. For each damage point allocated to the target by this ability, you can return 1 slain model to that friendly unit.

prayer_lore.name: Blessed Feast
prayer_lore.description: The priest blesses his followers' next meal to bring health and happiness to those who partake.
prayer_lore.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
prayer_lore.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time a model in the target unit is slain, Heal (1) a friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit in combat with the target. If the chanting roll was 10+, Heal (D3) that friendly unit instead.

prayer_lore.name: The Summerking'S Favour
prayer_lore.description: The priest delivers a blistering sermon lionising the deeds of a courtly champion, marking them out as a saint in their followers' eyes.
prayer_lore.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Flesh-eater Courts Hero wholly within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
prayer_lore.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time an enemy model is slain by a combat attack made by the target, give the target 1 additional noble deeds point after the Fight ability has been resolved. If the chanting roll was 10+, until the start of your next turn, each time an enemy model is slain by a combat attack made by the target, give all friendly Flesh-eater Courts Heroes wholly within 18" of the target 1 additional noble deeds point after the Fight ability has been resolved instead of only the target.

prayer_lore.name: Charnel Conviction
prayer_lore.description: Anointed with libations by their priest, ghouls believe themselves to be invincible warriors of faith.
prayer_lore.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit wholly within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
prayer_lore.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target has Ward (5+). If the chanting roll was 10+, pick another friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit wholly within 18" of the target. That unit also has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

manifestation_lore.name: Summon Chalice Of Ushoran
manifestation_lore.description: The wizard conjures forth a manifestation of the sacred cup held by Ushoran. This bone-wrought goblet is continually filled with the blood of those slain in its presence.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Chalice of Ushoran on the battlefield, pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Chalice of Ushoran wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

manifestation_lore.name: Summon Corpsemare Stampede
manifestation_lore.description: Imbued with grisly vigour by the insane magics of the abhorrants, the undead beasts of a Corpsemare Stampede burst from the blood-soaked ground to trample across the battlefield with reckless abandon.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Corpsemare Stampede on the battlefield, pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Corpsemare Stampede wholly within 9" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

manifestation_lore.name: Summon Cadaverous Barricade
manifestation_lore.description: With a word of command, the corpses of those who once served Ushoran rise up from the grave, dragging with them the detritus of a forgotten civilisation and clawing at the living with lifeless hands.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Cadaverous Barricade on the battlefield, pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Cadaverous Barricade wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

warscrolls.name: NAGASH SUPREME LORD OF THE UNDEAD

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, subtract 3 from its power level.

abilities.name: The Staff Of Power
abilities.description: Alakanash is capped with gems of purest grave-sand.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit while it has not miscast any spells this turn. If this unit miscasts a spell, ignore the restriction that would stop this unit from casting any more spells this turn.

abilities.name: Hand Of Dust
abilities.description: Nagash's touch can turn a foe to a pile of dusty bones in moments.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy Hero or Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Hide a dice in one of your hands or under one of two appropriate containers. Your opponent must pick one of your hands or containers. If they pick the one hiding the dice, this ability has no effect. If they pick the empty one, the target is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord Of The Undead
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Hero non-Unique Death unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit identical to the target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units. 7

abilities.name: Invocation Of Nagash
abilities.description: In a storm of morbid sorcery, Nagash blasts his foes' souls or re-knits his minions' bodies.
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell more than once per phase. Pick a visible unit wholly within 18" of this unit that has not been picked to be the target of this spell this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the target is a friendly Death unit, pick 1 of the following effects: * Return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3. * The target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Monstrous Talons is 6.

abilities.name: The Carrion King
abilities.description: News of Ushoran's mighty deeds spreads like wildfire through the Flesh-eater ranks.
abilities.effect: While this unit has 6 noble deeds points, the effect of the 'Feeding Frenzy' ability applies to friendly Flesh-eater Courts units while they are wholly within 24" of this unit instead of 12". 7

abilities.name: Glimpse Of Delusion
abilities.description: Ushoran pulls an enemy into his delusion, causing them to see friends as vicious monsters.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy model within 18" of this unit to be the target, pick another enemy unit within the target's combat range to be the victim, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the target's melee weapons. Immediately resolve combat attacks made with that weapon against the victim.

abilities.name: Shroudcage Fragment
abilities.description: Madness pulses from the gem in Ushoran's crown, overwhelming those who draw too close.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. If the roll exceeds the target's Control characteristic, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Epicentre Of Delusion
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn: The Royal Hunt: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by friendly Flesh-eater Courts units that target a Monster. Crusading Army: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly Flesh-eater Courts units. Defenders of the Realm: Add 1 to save rolls for friendly Flesh-eater Courts units while they are contesting an objective you control. The Grand Tournament: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by other friendly Flesh-eater Courts Heroes if they charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: ABHORRANT GHOUL KING ON ROYAL TERRORGHEIST

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Terrorgheist's Skeletal Talons is 4.

abilities.name: Gaping Maw
abilities.description: This horrific creature bites a great chunk out of its prey - or even swallows it whole.
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made with this unit's Terrorgheist's Fanged Maw scores a critical hit, that attack inflicts 6 mortal damage on the target unit and the attack sequence ends.

abilities.name: Ferocious Hunger
abilities.description: Assailed by visions of the glorious feast to come, the abhorrant's steed is filled with a hunger- driven impetus.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, attacks made with this unit's Terrorgheist's Fanged Maw that target that enemy unit score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: ABHORRANT GHOUL KING ON ROYAL ZOMBIE DRAGON

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Draconic Claws is 5.

abilities.name: Draconic Terror
abilities.description: To behold such a majestic beast as a dragon in the grip of undeath evokes awe and abject terror in equal measure.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target's Control characteristic, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Monstrous Hunger
abilities.description: The Ghoul King imposes his will upon the larger creatures of his court's menagerie, awakening a glimmer of predatory hunger in the long-dead beasts that sees them close upon their prey with greater swiftness.
abilities.effect: While they are wholly within 12" of this unit, friendly non-Hero Flesh-eater Courts Monsters can use Charge abilities even if they used a Run ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Delusion Of Justice Served
abilities.description: Should an enemy transgress Ushoran's laws, Gormayne's powerful oratory is quick to condemn them.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply to the target until the start of your next turn: Petty Transgression: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks that target that unit. Dishonourable Conduct in Battle: Friendly non-Monster Flesh-eater Courts units can use Charge abilities even if they used a Run ability in the same turn, but if they do so, they must end the charge move within ½" of the target. Grievous Insult to the Court: While the target is in combat with a friendly Abhorrant, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly Flesh-eater Courts units that target that unit. Regicide: If the target destroyed a friendly Abhorrant this battle, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Flesh-eater Courts units that target that unit.

abilities.name: Royal Hunting Party
abilities.description: A Gorewarden is responsible for patrolling the borders of their liege's greater territory, leading flights of warriors to suddenly fall upon and eviscerate trespassers.
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, you can pick up to 2 friendly Crypt Flayers or Morbheg Knights units that are not in combat and are wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Remove this unit and the targets (if any) from the battlefield. Set up this unit again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up each target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: The King'S Entreaty
abilities.description: The message within the infected bone carried by a Marrowscroll Herald is an entreaty to madness and carnage; to reject it is to rouse the ire of the ghoulish throngs.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects: Attack the Apostate!: Friendly Flesh-eater Courts units in combat with the target have Strike-first for the rest of the turn. Welcome the Disciple!: The target has the Infected keyword for the rest of the battle. Each time your opponent declares a command, Spell ability or Prayer ability for an Infected unit, roll a dice. On a 5+: * If they declared a command, that command has no effect. The command still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost. * If they declared a Spell or Prayer ability, that spell or prayer fails.

abilities.name: Don'T Shoot The Messenger
abilities.description: Marrowscroll Heralds are viewed as divine messengers by their ghoulish minions, who will go to any lengths to protect them.
abilities.effect: While this unit is not in combat and is wholly within the combat ranges of 3 or more other friendly Flesh-eater Courts Infantry models, it is not visible to enemy units.

abilities.name: Shrieking Charge
abilities.description: Nightshriekers emit bursts of maniacal, screech-like laughter that carry the curse of madness, leaving their prey staggering.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Predator'S Pounce
abilities.description: Though they lack the power of true flight, nightshriekers can leap clean over obstacles and the heads of the foe, allowing the Morbheg Knights to strike and disengage at will.
abilities.effect: This unit can use Charge abilities even if it used a Retreat ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by Retreat abilities.

abilities.name: Royal Bodyguard
abilities.description: In battle, it falls to the tenacious Cryptguard to form a half-living shield for their vampiric overlords.
abilities.effect: While any friendly Flesh-eater Courts Heroes are wholly within this unit's combat range, both this unit and those Heroes have Ward (5+).

abilities.name: Bounding Strides
abilities.description: Varghulfs leap and bound across the battlefield with uncanny bestial agility.
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Victory Feast
abilities.description: A Varghulf rampages through the enemy's ranks at will, its wounds sealing with unholy rapidity as it guzzles the flesh of the savaged foe.
abilities.effect: If any models were slain by this unit this turn: * Heal (D6) this unit. * This unit can immediately use the 'Retreat' ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

abilities.name: Rousing Oration
abilities.description: The Cardinal espouses the virtues of the noble heroes of the court.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Hero wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, give the target a number of noble deeds points equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Off With Their Head!
abilities.description: A Royal Decapitator's axe hungers to cleave through necks in one fell swing.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry Hero that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit's attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, the target is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Carrion Call
abilities.description: A triumphant bellowing blast echoes across the land, beckoning the ghoulish hordes to battle.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The first friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit to be set up in the following movement phase can immediately move D6". That unit cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

abilities.name: Countless Servants
abilities.description: With a chilling shriek, the Archregent summons some of their most trusted warriors.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Serfs or Knights unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+: * If the target is a Serfs unit, you can return up to 3 slain models to that unit. * If the target is a Knights unit, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.

abilities.name: Code Of Honour
abilities.description: Delusions of chivalry and honourable combat swirling in their fevered mind, the Ghoul King issues a direct challenge to an enemy champion - and then immediately pounces upon them like a frenzied beast.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's melee weapons, but all of this unit's attacks must target that Hero.

abilities.name: Unnatural Speed
abilities.description: Deathly energies swell the abhorrant's muscles and strengthen their sinews before they explode into motion, bounding towards the foe with terrifying swiftness.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase, it has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Mind-Shattering Cacophony
abilities.description: When a Crypt Infernal Courtier directs their retinue to focus their death screams on an enemy, the resulting discordant soundwaves can fell the mightiest of foes.
abilities.effect: If any enemy models were slain by this unit's Piercing Death Screech this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly Crypt Flayers units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

melee.name: Massive Bone Club and Rancid Talons

abilities.name: Noble Blood Knightly Exemplar
abilities.description: Witnessing a Crypt Haunter Courtier's frenzied, blood- spraying assault sends the warriors in their pack into a murderous frenzy.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Crypt Horrors unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit's combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Escort Courtier
abilities.description: There are many ghoulish legends of Crypt Flayers winging down to lift noble heroes into the sky, either plucking them from danger or carrying them into the fray.
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Infantry Hero that does not have Fly and is within this unit's combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield. Then, this unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It cannot end that move in combat. Then, set up the target within this unit's combat range and more than 3" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Royal Approval
abilities.description: These mordants will always do their utmost to attract the attention of their sovereign.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly Courtiers or Abhorrants.

abilities.name: Noble Blood
abilities.description: The blood of their liege grants these Flesh-eaters a supernatural regenerative capacity.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Royal Approval
abilities.description: These mordants will always do their utmost to attract the attention of their sovereign.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly Courtiers or Abhorrants.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Draconic Claws is 5.

abilities.name: Vantage Point
abilities.description: The Zombie Dragon approaches the front line from above, eye sockets aglow with unholy energy.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve high above the battlefield. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Loathsome Descent
abilities.description: With a deafening roar, the Zombie Dragon dives into battle like a foul comet.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is high above the battlefield.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Soaring Terror
abilities.description: The Zombie Dragon soars over the enemy warriors, scouring those below with its corrosive breath.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units but must end that move in combat. Then, pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Skeletal Talons is 4.

abilities.name: Gaping Maw
abilities.description: This horrific creature bites a great chunk out of its prey - or even swallows it whole.
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made with this unit's Fanged Maw scores a critical hit, that attack inflicts 6 mortal damage on the target unit and the attack sequence ends.

abilities.name: Death Shriek
abilities.description: The terrifying shriek of a Terrorgheist is enough to stop a warrior's heart.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If 3 or more damage points are allocated to the target by this ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Hunter'S Instincts
abilities.description: Royal Beastflayers believe themselves to be the finest monster-slayers in all the land. Certainly, they possess a knack for hindering and ensnaring their prey before moving in to make the kill.
abilities.effect: Enemy Monsters cannot use Rampage abilities while they are in combat with this unit. In addition, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy Monsters and Beast units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Royal Flaymaster
abilities.description: The Royal Flaymaster skewers enemies using their hunting polearm as the Offal Hounds pounce to finish off their prey.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any, if the target is a Monster or Beast unit.

abilities.name: Trampled Underfoot
abilities.description: As a Corpsemare Stampede charges across the battlefield, it tramples over anything that gets in its way.
abilities.effect: This Manifestation can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. This Manifestation can pass through models and the combat ranges of enemy units, but it cannot end that move in combat. Then, pick up to 3 enemy units that this Manifestation passed across during that move to be the targets. Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Designer's Note: This Manifestation can use this ability even if it is in combat.

abilities.name: Grasping Hands
abilities.description: The animated corpses trapped in a Cadaverous Barricade grab at any living creature that comes too close.
abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use Run or Retreat abilities while they are within this Manifestation's combat range. In addition, if an enemy unit is picked to use a Move ability while it is within this Manifestation's combat range, halve that unit's Move characteristic (rounding up) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Fill The Chalice
abilities.description: The blood of slain warriors is siphoned into this fell manifestation.
abilities.effect: Each time a model (friendly or enemy) is slain within 12" of this Manifestation, give this Manifestation a blood point, to a maximum of 6.

abilities.name: Overflowing Gore
abilities.description: When the gore inside the chalice overflows, the Flesh-eaters upon whom it slops are granted unnatural vitality.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit wholly within 18" of this Manifestation to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add the number of blood points this Manifestation has to the target's control score for the rest of the turn. Then, reset this Manifestation's blood points to 0.

abilities.name: Steward Of The Realm
abilities.description: Those who sit upon a Charnel Throne rule over all they survey, but they must be wary of foes who would see them violently cast down.
abilities.effect: While this terrain feature has a Steward: * The Steward cannot use Move abilities. * Instead of measuring range or visibility to the Steward, measure to this terrain feature instead. * All attacks that would target the Steward target this terrain feature instead. * If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Steward. Then, set up the Steward on the battlefield within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer the Steward. If it is not possible to set up the Steward, it is slain.

abilities.name: Reigning Champion
abilities.description: A trusted member of the court may sit the throne in the absence of their liege-lord, though they must abdicate immediately on their return.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Steward, pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Infantry Hero within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now the Steward (see 'Steward of the Realm').

abilities.name: Duty Calls
abilities.description: When duty demands it, an abhorrant monarch or their regent will descend from the throne to take up the sword and defend the kingdom.
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Steward, set up the Steward on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer the Steward.

abilities.name: Ruler Of All They Survey
abilities.description: A Charnel Throne forms a nexus of delusion, and a cannibal champion seated upon such a grisly construct becomes convinced of their own grandeur.
abilities.effect: Give D3 noble deeds points to this terrain feature's Steward.
